          <title>
            <string language="en">A chemical reaction and a word equation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine chemische Reaktion und eine Wortgleichung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une réaction chimique et une équation de mot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma reação química e uma equação da palavra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una reazione chimica e un'equazione di parola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια χημική αντίδραση και μια εξίσωση λέξης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una reacción química y una ecuación de la 
palabra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a chemical reaction involving magnesium and hydrochloric acid.  Its equivalent  word equation is also provided.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">word equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt eine chemische Reaktion, 
die Magnesium und Salzsäure mit einbezieht. Seine gleichwertige
Wortgleichung wird auch zur Verfügung gestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre une réaction chimique 
impliquant le magnésium et l'acide chlorhydrique. Son équation
équivalente de mot est également fournie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra uma reação química que 
envolve o magnésio e o ácido hydrochloric. Sua equação 
equivalente da palavra é fornecida também.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra una reazione chimica che 
coinvolge il magnesio e l'acido cloridrico. La relativa 
equazione equivalente di parola egualmente è fornita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει χημική αντίδραση που 
περιλαμβάνει το μαγνήσιο και το υδροχλωρικό οξύ. Η 
ισοδύναμη εξίσωση λέξης της παρέχεται επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra una reacción química que 
implica el magnesio y el ácido hidroclórico. Su ecuación 
equivalente de la palabra también se proporciona.</string>
          </description>
